p: In this Wiki I post links to programs I find useful. I love to share information and helping others.
This is great for websites you don't plan on staying for.
Tempmail is a website or app for Android/iOS. It allows users to have a temporary e-mail for sites they don't fully trust and not receive spam in your main e-mail.
It also allows you to move the session to a phone or share it with someone less tech savvy than you.
Lets you easily setup the most recent version of the programs you use.

An image of Ninite's website Ninite stay's up-to-date because at launch it fetches the latest version for you. Which is great if you are lazy like me and don't want to go to the respective websites to download them. Ninite's Pro Version homepage Ninite even has a Pro Version of their software which is great if you are a System Admin
Compresses your video to fit discords upload restrictions. 8mbvideo
An easy tool to make timestamps for Discord. Discord Timestamp
Open source office suite for most platforms. LibreOffice
Free stock photos for download. Unsplash
Stuff you can find on amazon at huge discount. Amazon Overstock
Movie and TV Show tracker that give's you recommendations and notifies you if new episodes come out or movies come out. JustWatch
Give's you recipes from things you have in your fridge. Great for those with an "empty fridge". MyFridgeFood
